issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5. Description:
The RSS Sample has missing semicolons which is indicated as an exclamation mark on each file with the problem.

The sample also uses the newly-deprecated "navgroup" object which also produces a warning.

h5. Steps to reproduce:
1) import the RSS reader sample
2) Open the file resources/services/rss.js
3) Open the file resources/ui/handheld/ios/ApplicationWindow.js

h5. Result:
rss.ja has missing semicolons.
ApplicationWindow.js has deprecated objects

h5. Expected Result:
No warnings
fields.summary: Samples: RSS Reader sample has warnings - missing semicolons and deprecated objects
fields.environment:
Mac OS 10.8.5
Xcode 5.0.2
CLI: 3.2.0
Alloy: 1.3.0
Titanium SDK version  3.2.0.v20131115115645
Titanium Studio, build: 3.2.0.201311122225

comments.body:
Bug still persits on:
Mac OSX 10.9 Mavericks
Titanium Studio, build: 3.2.0.201311160316
Titanium SDK, build: 3.2.0.v20131118211643
CLI: 3.2.0-alpha
Alloy: 1.3.0

Pulled the RSS sample project from the github repository.
Semicolon errors are fixed however the deprecated object still remains.
Project cannot be built to iPhone because of this error.
Re-opening.

[~mxia] [~sdowse] Updated PR with to fix remaining issues.
PR [MASTER] https://github.com/appcelerator-developer-relations/Sample.RSS/pull/8
Updated app from deprecated iPhone.NavigationGroup to the new iOS.NavigationWindow

Verified fixed on:
Mac OSX 10.9 Mavericks
Titanium Studio, build: 3.2.0.201311200322
Titanium SDK, build: 3.2.0.v20131119142443
CLI: 3.2.0-alpha
Alloy: 1.3.0

Pulled the RSS sample project from the github repository.
Semicolon and Deprecated method warnings no longer shown throughout application.
Project successfully installed on iPhone.
Closing/
